text: Can you please cancel my appointment with id 78901234 for August 5th, 2023 with Dr. Chen under the name Sarah Johnson?
Sure, I can help you with that.
Your appointment has been cancelled, would you like to book a new one?
No, thank you. Can you also record my health data?
Of course! Please provide me your user ID, time and your health data.
My user ID is 12345, the time is 2023-08-06 09:00:00 and my health data is blood_pressure 120/80 and heart_rate 80.
Your health data has been recorded successfully, is there anything else I can help you with?
Can you tell me if I had an appointment with Dr. Johnson on May 20th, 2023?
Sure, let me check that for you.
According to our records, you had an appointment with Dr. Johnson on May 20th, 2023. Is there anything else I can help you with?
You're welcome, have a great day!
